text:
View The Slideshow Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images Awards, schmawards. Everyone knows the best part about watching the annual Oscars ceremony is gazing upon the endless parade of glamorous people descending onto the red carpet, all dolled up in their finest outfits to hopefully take home some gold hardware. (Fine, it may not be all about the fashions.) Click through the slideshow to see all of the evening’s looks, and be sure to also follow along with our live-blog right here.

View All of the Looks Tags: vulture homepage lede slideshows look books oscars 2017 awards season fashion See All of the 2017 Oscars Red-Carpet Looks Share on Facebook Tweet this Story Top Stories People’s Court ’s Judge Joseph Wapner Dead at 97 Australian Author Recounts Terrifying Detainment by U.S. Immigration Officers Neil Fingleton, Game of Thrones ’ Mag the Mighty, Dead at 36 Most Viewed Stories ‘Defamed’ Meryl Streep Slams Karl Lagerfeld Over Oscars Dress Controversy; Lagerfeld Issues Apology Bill Paxton Dead at 61 Neil Fingleton, Game of Thrones ’ Mag the Mighty, Dead at 36 Natalie Portman Skipping Oscars Due to Pregnancy Remy Ma Drops Nicki Minaj Diss Track; Minaj Responds What to Stream Now See what's new and notable on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, and HBO Nocturnal Animals Has Two Endings, and Both of Them Are Killer Nick Kroll and John Mulaney’s Hilarious Spirit Awards Monologue Confirms They Should Be Hosting the Oscars Next Year Celebrities Grieve the Death of Bill Paxton Maggie Smith Went Full Dowager Countess on Ian McKellen at the Oscars Vulture’s Final 2017 Oscar Predictions for Every Category Most Popular Video On Vulture Keanu Reeves Is Obsessed With Doing His Own Stunts Latest News from Vulture 14 mins ago See All of the 2017 Oscars Red-Carpet Looks Strike a haute couture pose.
4:43 p.m. Chance the Rapper Giving Away a Day of Get Out Showings at Chicago Movie Theater Patrons of Chicago’s Chatham 14 are in for a terrifying treat.
4:10 p.m. Outlander ’s Claire and Jamie Will Still Have Smokin’ Hot Sex 20 Years Later With age comes wisdom and the undiminished capacity for a very compelling sex scene.
3:52 p.m. This Video Shows 15 of the Most Memorable Oscars Outfits of All Time Some of the Oscars’ most iconic looks.
3:35 p.m. James Cameron Remembers Friend, Collaborator, and ‘Creative Dynamo’ Bill Paxton “I hope that amid the gaudy din of Oscar night, people will take a moment to remember this wonderful man.”
3:11 p.m. People’s Court ’s Judge Joseph Wapner Dead at 97 Wapner was a massive figure in the rise of reality TV.
2:51 p.m. Australian Author Recounts Terrifying Detainment by U.S. Immigration Officers “This is what happens when extremists take power.”
1:55 p.m. Watch the 3 Color Tricks That Defined La La Land ’s Dreamy Los Angeles Mia’s yellow dress is pretty—and a pretty important plot device.
12:45 p.m. The Good Fight Recap: Who Voted for Trump? “The Schtup List” tees up storylines for the rest of the season.
12:34 p.m. Celebrities Grieve the Death of Bill Paxton Paxton died Saturday at the age of 61.
11:48 a.m. Neil Fingleton, Game of Thrones ’ Mag the Mighty, Dead at 36 The 7’7” actor died of heart failure.
11:26 a.m. Andy Samberg Breaks Out Eddie Vedder Impression to Celebrate Alive Celebs Call it a “non-memoriam” segment.
10:45 a.m. David Harewood Doesn’t Want Doctor Who ’s Next Doctor to Be a White Man “It needs to do something different.”
10:41 a.m. Bill Paxton Dead at 61 The actor died from complications due to surgery.
9:56 a.m. Barry Jenkins, Ava DuVernay Mad Over Trans Rights Threats at Indie Spirit Awards “I’m pretty sure the majority of the room in that hangar is pissed off.”
9:50 a.m. Academy Strips 13 Hours’ Sound Mixer of Nom Due to Illicit Telephone Lobbying Illicit. Telephone. Lobbying.
9:17 a.m. Watch a Definitive Snapshot of the Past 20 Years of Costume-Design Winners All in one place.
9:02 a.m. You Need to Watch Nick Kroll, John Mulaney’s Hilarious Spirit Awards Monologue “We like to think of these awards as the ones without Mel Gibson.”
8:21 a.m. ‘Defamed’ Meryl Streep Slams Karl Lagerfeld Over Dress Controversy; Gets Apology “Karl Lagerfeld, a prominent designer, defamed me.”
Yesterday at 10:10 p.m. Planet Earth II Recap: The One With the Mountains These flamingos know how to party.
